article.Heading: Budget 2016 India: Tiles stocks up; govt allots Rs 9000cr to Swachh Bharat mission
article.Summary: The ceramics & granite stocks, including Nitco, HSIL, Somany Ceramics and Euro Ceramics gained post government allocation of Rs 9000 crore towards Swachh Bharat Mission.
article.Body:
Moneycontrol Bureau

The ceramics & granite stocks, including Nitco, HSIL, Somany Ceramics and Euro Ceramics gained post government allocation of Rs 9000 crore towards Swachh Bharat Mission.

At 14:27 hrs Nitco was quoting at Rs 30.90, up Rs 0.85, or 2.83 percent.
